---
category: news
title: "Representation of molecular structures with persistent homology for machine learning applications in chemistry"
excerpt: "The choice of molecular representations can severely impact the performances of machine-learning methods. Here the authors demonstrate a persistence homology based molecular representation through an active-learning approach for predicting CO2/N2 interaction energies at the density functional theory (DFT) level."
